data.eml:eml: Monoxia obesula Blake, 1939, a species native to the U. S. A. and adventive to Sardinia, Italy (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae: Galerucini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Clark, Shawn M., Rattu, Andrea, Cillo, Davide (2014): Monoxia obesula Blake, 1939, a species native to the U. S. A. and adventive to Sardinia, Italy (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae: Galerucini). Zootaxa 3774 (1): 83-89, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.1.6
